argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | refsum2cn.1 | |- F/_ x F |
| 2 |  | refsum2cn.2 | |- F/_ x G |
| 3 |  | refsum2cn.3 | |- F/ x ph |
| 4 |  | refsum2cn.4 | |- K = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 5 |  | refsum2cn.5 | |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) |
| 6 |  | refsum2cn.6 | |- ( ph -> F e. ( J Cn K ) ) |
| 7 |  | refsum2cn.7 | |- ( ph -> G e. ( J Cn K ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x { 1 , 2 } |
| 9 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ x k = 1 |
| 10 | 9, 1, 2 | #P_nfif | |- F/_ x if ( k = 1 , F , G ) |
| 11 | 8, 10 | #P_nfmpt | |- F/_ x ( k e. { 1 , 2 } |-> if ( k = 1 , F , G ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( k e. { 1 , 2 } |-> if ( k = 1 , F , G ) ) = ( k e. { 1 , 2 } |-> if ( k = 1 , F , G ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 1, 2, 3, 12, 4, 5, 6, 7 | #P_refsum2cnlem1 | |- ( ph -> ( x e. X |-> ( ( F ` x ) + ( G ` x ) ) ) e. ( J Cn K ) ) |
